title: Pathway systems other than for core and access networks

content.text: The requirements are applicable to pathway systems other than those owned by access providers.
The administration (installation) requirements shall be Level 3 of EN 50174-1. The administration (operation)  requirements shall be Level 2 of EN 50174-1.

requirements.text: The administration (installation) requirements shall be Level 3 of EN 50174-1. The administration (operation)  requirements shall be Level 2 of EN 50174-1.
